alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 11 at 5:00PM MST until January 16 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST /8 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado and northwest and west central Kansas. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM MST /8 PM CST/ this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 8 AM MST /9 AM CST/ Friday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Friday to 11 AM MST /noon CST/ Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick road conditions and reductions in visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Winter Weather Advisory for NW Kansas and eastern Colorado will see near blizzard to intermittent blizzard conditions. Local reductions in visibility around one quarter mile have been reported.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
